name: Black White Tiles (New): Piano Tiles Mini Games
name_original: Black White Tiles (New): Piano Tiles Mini Games
description:
◈ ◈ “Black White Tiles(New)” is coming. ◈ ◈
◈ ◈ “Black White Tiles" now has 200 AWESOME Games. ◈ ◈

Dear White Tiles player,

◈ This is Black White Tiles new version, which has more games, more songs, more themes, and more fun.

◈ Black White Tiles has 100 whiteTiles games and more than 100 trivia games. It doesn't have any iap. It‘s all free for everyone.

◈ The only thing you need to do is just TAP. Tap to start, tap to have fun.

◈ We will keep improving our game,more features are coming soon!

【Game Features】:
◈ 200 Awesome Games in 1 App.
◈ User Interface & Game Graphics Redesigned.
◈ New Game Categories system (Now you can find your favorite games more easily).
◈ Customize Your Own Games.
◈ Music system
◈ Theme system
◈ Amazing Color system
◈ Easy to play for all ages.
◈ An unparalleled gaming experience
◈ Social Share Support
